mapper.select: select car_info_id, car_info_brand, car_info_register_date, city_id, car_info_card, car_info_owner, car_info_frame_no, car_info_enigne_number, car_info_configuration_model, car_info_date_first, car_info_transfer, car_info_transfer_date, user_id from insurance.insurance_car_info where car_info_id = #{carInfoId}

select car_info_id, car_info_brand, car_info_register_date, city_id, car_info_card, car_info_owner, car_info_frame_no, car_info_enigne_number, car_info_configuration_model, car_info_date_first, car_info_transfer, car_info_transfer_date, user_id from insurance.insurance_car_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into insurance.insurance_car_info(car_info_brand, car_info_register_date, city_id, car_info_card, car_info_owner, car_info_frame_no, car_info_enigne_number, car_info_configuration_model, car_info_date_first, car_info_transfer, car_info_transfer_date, user_id) values (#{carInfoBrand}, #{carInfoRegisterDate}, #{cityId}, #{carInfoCard}, #{carInfoOwner}, #{carInfoFrameNo}, #{carInfoEnigneNumber}, #{carInfoConfigurationModel}, #{carInfoDateFirst}, #{carInfoTransfer}, #{carInfoTransferDate}, #{userId})
mapper.update:
update insurance.insurance_car_info
car_info_brand = #{carInfoBrand},
car_info_register_date = #{carInfoRegisterDate},
city_id = #{cityId},
car_info_card = #{carInfoCard},
car_info_owner = #{carInfoOwner},
car_info_frame_no = #{carInfoFrameNo},
car_info_enigne_number = #{carInfoEnigneNumber},
car_info_configuration_model = #{carInfoConfigurationModel},
car_info_date_first = #{carInfoDateFirst},
car_info_transfer = #{carInfoTransfer},
car_info_transfer_date = #{carInfoTransferDate},
user_id = #{userId},
where car_info_id = #{carInfoId}
